name: Host of Brothers
description:
Hi, this is my first game school project called : Host of Brothers.

Our mission was to hijack an existing game and work on the meaning of it on a narrative, graphic and in a mechanical way. Your goal is to survive in war, alone or with your brothers...

I've worked on the game design and also 2D asset.

TEAM : 

Emilien Marchal = Game Developper

Ewenn Cochennec = Narrative Designer

Anthonin Arnold = Game developper

Zora Gordon = Graph 2D

Agathe Clement = Game Design, Graph 2D
